props.name: data
props.description: The data record array to be rendered

props.name: selectable
props.description: True to show a checkbox on the left ('left' or 'right')

props.name: selectKeyField
props.description: True to select keyField, False to select row index

props.name: hasDetailView
props.description: True to show detail view table

slots.name: thead
slots.description: The thead slot holds the table head text and can contain HTML

slots.name: tbody
slots.description: The tbody slot holds the table body text and can contain HTML

slots.name: tfoot
slots.description: The tfoot slot holds the table foot text and can contain HTML

slots.name: detail
slots.description: The detail slot holds the detail view text and can contain HTML

events.name: selected
events.description: Callback that is called when selected rows change

events.name: view-detail
events.description: Dispatched when the detail view is changed
